subject: Families and Family Life
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain is 22, and his talent is the envy of pitchers much older. But he remains a “big kid,”enamored with tattoos and text messaging, and Apple Jacks.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain is 22, and his talent is the envy of pitchers much older. But he remains a “big kid,”enamored with tattoos and text messaging, and Apple Jacks.
